Limited visibility of billionaire Peter Thiel’s proposed Wānaka lodge cited https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/limited-visibility-of-billionaire-peter-thiels-propose-wanaka-lodge-cited/WAC3XX4W6VDL3JL4J5BTLIQAEU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/limited-visibility-of-billionaire-peter-thiels-propose-wanaka-lodge-cited/WAC3XX4W6VDL3JL4J5BTLIQAEU/ Guy WilliamsThe 193ha Otago site was bought by the American billionaire in 2015. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 08:22:19 +0000 An artist's impression of the proposed lodge overlooking Lake Wānaka.
UK grandfather facing deportation for failing to declare criminal past allowed to remain in NZ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/uk-grandfather-faceing-deportation-for-failing-to-declare-criminal-past-allowed-to-remain-in-nz/JBCJS7ZOARGINIA7QATFLH7K4E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/uk-grandfather-faceing-deportation-for-failing-to-declare-criminal-past-allowed-to-remain-in-nz/JBCJS7ZOARGINIA7QATFLH7K4E/ Tracy NealThe man's deportation appeal failed on the facts but was allowed on humanitarian grounds. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 07:00:00 +0000 A 70-year-old who failed to declare a conviction for indecent assault will remain in New Zealand following a successful appeal against a deportation notice. Photo / 123rf
Paraparaumu Beach family’s driveway can become a waterway when steady rain strikes https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kapiti-news/news/paraparaumu-beach-familys-driveway-can-become-a-waterway-when-steady-rain-strikes/JNZTULIGKVF27KEFEONH7HZWLU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kapiti-news/news/paraparaumu-beach-familys-driveway-can-become-a-waterway-when-steady-rain-strikes/JNZTULIGKVF27KEFEONH7HZWLU/ David HaxtonRiley family want stormwater system sorted. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 06:14:53 +0000 The Riley family, from left Matthew, Samuel, Jorden, and Angela, at the front of their Whyte St home in Paraparaumu Beach. Photo / David Haxton
Labour slams Government for hiking fuel tax by 22c next term, increasing regos by $50, slashing public transport cash https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/transport-announcement-likely-as-pm-christopher-luxon-fronts-post-cabinet-press-conference/WRDZ7RPY7BE65DG27K4C63BQFI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/transport-announcement-likely-as-pm-christopher-luxon-fronts-post-cabinet-press-conference/WRDZ7RPY7BE65DG27K4C63BQFI/ Adam Pearse, Thomas CoughlanThe Government has unveiled its transport spending priorities. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 06:05:34 +0000 Prime Minister Christopher Luxon during the post-Cabinet press conference at the Beehive. Photo / Mark Mitchell
Cyber attack: Hackers steal confidential client information from auto software company Auxo, demand ransom https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/cyber-attack-hackers-steal-confidential-client-information-from-auto-software-company-auxo-demand-ransom/CWBABM52YBBUXIM64V26KLOQWA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/cyber-attack-hackers-steal-confidential-client-information-from-auto-software-company-auxo-demand-ransom/CWBABM52YBBUXIM64V26KLOQWA/ Ric Stevens'Credible threat' that some of the information will be posted on the dark web. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Auxos, target of a cyber attack, says the international hackers are highly sophisticated and operating at scale.
Waiwera pair left clinging to upturned dinghy before ‘miracle’ rescue from water https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waiwera-pair-left-clinging-to-upturned-dinghy-before-miracle-rescue-from-water/BLPD7VK23VGHBP7APEGVFLSIOU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waiwera-pair-left-clinging-to-upturned-dinghy-before-miracle-rescue-from-water/BLPD7VK23VGHBP7APEGVFLSIOU/ Rachel MaherThe pair, which included an elderly man, were left clinging to their upturned dinghy. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 06:00:00 +0000 The couple were found clinging to the upturned vessel and were rescued from the water by the Coastguard.
Person trapped on Auckland’s North Shore after powerline falls on vehicle https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-trapped-on-aucklands-north-shore-after-powerline-falls-on-vehicle/6LYT6BZ4HVC7ZKIKHSCHJ2VEVE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/person-trapped-on-aucklands-north-shore-after-powerline-falls-on-vehicle/6LYT6BZ4HVC7ZKIKHSCHJ2VEVE/ Fenz was waiting on the power authority to proceed with their rescue. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 05:56:47 +0000 A fire crew is assisting a person trapped in their vehicle on Auckland's North Shore this evening. Photo / NZME
Murder trial begins for Peter Greene, accused with Darren Couper of fatal Auckland attack on Kevin Hay https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/murder-trial-begins-for-peter-greene-accused-with-darren-couper-of-fatal-auckland-attack-on-kevin-hay/ 5O3QT4POU5BYVMYHIKJDOE3EOQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/murder-trial-begins-for-peter-greene-accused-with-darren-couper-of-fatal-auckland-attack-on-kevin-hay/ 5O3QT4POU5BYVMYHIKJDOE3EOQ/ Craig KapitanThe co-defendants were trained in kung fu. One said punching officer also was defensive. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 05:50:16 +0000 Kevin Hay, 50, was stabbed to death in August 2022. Peter Green is charged with murder, while co-defendant Darren Couper is accused of wounding Hay with intent to cause grievous bodily harm. Both men are on trial in the High Court at Auckland.
Voter fraud: 55 people alleged to have voted more than once at 2023 General Election https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/voter-fraud-55-people-alleged-to-have-voted-more-than-once-at-2023-general-election/ZHSGHF5RX5EODMHYFTUCP45SNU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/voter-fraud-55-people-alleged-to-have-voted-more-than-once-at-2023-general-election/ZHSGHF5RX5EODMHYFTUCP45SNU/ Raphael FranksThe Electoral Commission has referred 55 people to police for alleged voting fraud. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 05:32:51 +0000 Voting more than once is an offence under section 215 of the Electoral Act.
Tauhinu Rd, SH18 crash: Auckland police officer charged after death of fleeing motorcyclist https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-officer-charged-after-fleeing-driver-crashes-on-auckland-motorway-dies-at-the-scene/QDRFXWWH4VHJFEG5K4COYUJEJA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-officer-charged-after-fleeing-driver-crashes-on-auckland-motorway-dies-at-the-scene/QDRFXWWH4VHJFEG5K4COYUJEJA/ Benjamin PlummerThe officer has been placed on restricted duties while the matter is before the court. Mon, 04 Mar 2024 05:11:56 +0000 Police investigate the scene of a motor vehicle accident in which a motorcycle collided with a truck at the Tauhinu Road off-ramp at Greenhithe. Photo / Hayden Woodward
